description: This file provides a utility function 'shareToClipstack' that copies a URL to the clipboard and displays an alert message, depending on the platform. It serves as a helper for sharing URLs via a native extension or system share functionality in a React Native project.

methods.name: export async function shareToClipstack(url: string) { shareToClipstack
methods.description: Asynchronous function to copy a URL to the clipboard and show an alert message describing the sharing process based on the platform.
